channel.title: Summoning
channel.description:
[img]http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/6840/summon2ms5.jpg[/img]
Video: [url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2643wh4&s=3]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2643wh4&s=3[/url] Summoning raises max combat level to 138
Also with this, monsters are able to be summoned! Different monsters will have different effects.
White wolf: Fights in battle
Terrorbird: Opens up deposit bank booth, must be out of combat to use this, and also charges a few ecto-tokens to open
Pyrefiend: Gives extra firemaking experience when firemaking, and automatically cooks food for you
Scorpion: Poisons other player
Shadow spider: Drains other players prayer points
Red baby dragon: Fights in battle
Rock golem: Gives extra mining experience when mining, and it counts as a pickaxe
Tree spirit: Gives extra woodcutting experience when woodcutting, and it counts as free rune arrows
Giant rock crab: Fights in battle, gives 2 lobsters to you each time it attacks
Black knight titan: Fights in battle
Gelatinnoth mother: Heals you in battle
Jungle demon: Fights in battle, and it gives you 8 extra battle damage. That means if your max hit is 40, you can hit 48.

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @Killer-99-pkz Killer-99-pkz
item.description:
@Killer-99-pkz wrote:

lmfao? your falling bheind my avrege player count is about 50 10 new ppl per day, i think i owned ur a**, shouldent of banned me i wouldent of made my server, but its good.

This stuff is easy.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2008, 12:35:19 PM[/size][hr]try doing this for 10 days strait, jaggrab

[code]private DataInputStream openJagGrabInputStream(String s)
throws IOException
{
// if(!aBoolean872)
// if(signlink.mainapp != null)
// return signlink.openurl(s);
// else
// return new DataInputStream((new URL(getCodeBase(), s)).openStream());
if(aSocket832 != null)
{
try
{
aSocket832.close();
}
catch(Exception _ex) { }
aSocket832 = null;
}
aSocket832 = openSocket(43595);
aSocket832.setSoTimeout(10000);
java.io.InputStream inputstream = aSocket832.getInputStream();
OutputStream outputstream = aSocket832.getOutputStream();
outputstream.write((“JAGGRAB /” + s + “\n\n”).getBytes());
return new DataInputStream(inputstream);
}

public Socket openSocket(int i) throws IOException {
if(signlink.mainapp != null)
return signlink.opensocket(i);
else
return new Socket(InetAddress.getByName(getCodeBase().getHost()), i);
}[/code]

Read full topic
